## West Rockhill Township, Pennsylvania, Pool Complex Bond Measure (November 2024)
## West Rockhill Township, Pennsylvania, Pool Complex Bond Measure (November 2024)

,9.17,21.0,0.6694181379623955,0.8918918918918919,['West Rockhill Township, Pennsylvania, Pool Complex Bond Measure (November 2024)']","['“Shall debt in the amount up to Three Million Dollars ($3,000,000.00) for the purpose of assisting the West Rockhill-Sellersville Joint Recreation Authority refurbish and repair the Holiday House Pool Complex be authorized to be incurred as debt approved by the electors of West Rockhill Township?”']","# Ballot for Bucks County, Pennsylvania
## West Rockhill Township, Pennsylvania, Pool Complex Bond Measure (November 2024)

“Shall debt in the amount up to Three Million Dollars ($3,000,000.00) for the purpose of assisting the West Rockhill-Sellersville Joint Recreation Authority refurbish and repair the Holiday House Pool Complex be authorized to be incurred as debt approved by the electors of West Rockhill Township?”

## West Rockhill Township, Pennsylvania, Pool Complex Bond Measure (November 2024)

“Shall debt in the amount up to Three Million Dollars ($3,000,000.00) for the purpose of assisting the West Rockhill-Sellersville Joint Recreation Authority refurbish and repair the Holiday House Pool Complex be authorized to be incurred as debt approved by the electors of West Rockhill Township?”
